author: Dr. John Campbell
description:
Autism Spectrum Disorder

https://www.cdc.gov/autism/data-research/index.html

Autism and Developmental Disabilities Monitoring (ADDM) Network

https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/72/ss/ss7202a1.htm?s_cid=ss7202a1_w

ADDM Network, 2000-2020: Combining data from all sites, (8 year olds)

2000  1 in 150

2002  1 in 150

2004  1 in 125

2006  1 in 110

2008  1 in 88

2010  1 in 68

2012  1 in 69

2014  1 in 59

2016  1 in 54

2018  1 in 44

2020  1 in 36
2020 data, 11 sites

(Arizona, Arkansas, California, Georgia, Maryland, Minnesota, Missouri, New Jersey, Tennessee, Utah, and Wisconsin)

ASD in 8-year-olds

Prevalence per 1,000 was 27.6 (one in 36)

23.1 in Maryland

44.9 in California

Male-to-female prevalence ratio, 3.8

(43.0 among boys and 11.4 among girls).

For the first time, overall ASD prevalence for girls  more than 1% 

ASD is reported to occur in all racial, ethnic, and socioeconomic groups.

Autistic people may:

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/autism/what-is-autism/

find it
title: Autism massive increase
